Daniel Wilson – “Proofread”

posted by Joyce on December 9, 2014 in Audio

Image via Daniel Wilson on Facebook

As if Daniel Wilson hadn’t already proved to listeners his incredible range, he shares another single from his recently released Boy Who Cried Thunder EP titled “Proofread.” An upbeat song featuring a lively, percussion-led beat, Wilson’s silky voice still manages to be the main focus, his vocal acrobatics practiced with ease. If this somehow hasn’t convinced you of the singer’s talent, watch him perform an intimate rendition of “Boy Who Cried Thunder” for P&P.

Listen to “Proofread” below. Boy Who Cried Thunder is out now.

Related: 10 New Pop Artists Who We’d Like to Hear on Mainstream Radio
